lead_paragraph: At Brooklyn, suddenly, of scarlatina, on Thursday, evening, Oct. 9, between 10 and 11 o'clock, MARTHA SWAN, elder daughter of Wm. Trow, in the fourth year of her age. The friends of the family are invited to attend her funeral to-day, Oct. 11, at 3 o'clock, P.M., from No. 931 Gold-street, Brooklyn.
